name: Thirsty Bubble
description:
Introduction
Thirsty bubble is minor low poly ball/platformer game where player controlls crazy bubble. Player target is to find 6 red drink bottles in every level under limited time. Levels are different themed, like: snow, air, kingdom, forest, western etc styled levels. Levels contain also lot of damageable objects like fire, cactuses etc. Also some levels contain ai enemies like: snowman, zombie cars, zombie knights and ghost trains. After player has collected all six bottles level is completed. Player has also controll camera with mouse or gamepad, because bubble character is so crazy that camera can't always follow. That will increase game difficultyFeatures:- damageable objects
- Ai enemies
- Health system
- 22 levelsFuture updates: - New levels will added at least 3-5.
